Package org.appkit.util

Various utility-functions

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ParamSupplier<K,V>  
Throttle A throttle to be used to throttle expensive calls triggered by often-recurring events.
Ticker A ticker that notifies stuff.
Ticker.TickReceiver  
 

Class Summary
LoggingRunnable a Runnable that logs all RuntimeException
Naming<E> This serves as a generic dictionary which allows objects to be registered under names.
ResourceStreamSupplier a ParamSupplier which returns an InputStream by loading from resources
ResourceStringSupplier a ParamSupplier which returns Strings loaded from resources
SmartExecutor An Executor that provides commonly-used methods for running Runnables and is a Throttle.
SWTSyncedRunnable Wrapper for a Runnable that will execute it in the given Display's thread.
SWTSyncedTickReceiver Wrapper for a TickReceiver that will execute it in the given Display's thread.
